name: Shot Thru The Heart
description:
Hit fullscreen mode before playing, mouse capture is weird!  Or download for the OS of your choice!

You were in Beirut the first time you saw her. She was working with another sniper then. But you took care of that. Now she is your spotter and mentor. You've been activated for another mission, take out the the villainous "Luger", or die trying.  You've managed to keep your mission secret, but can you keep your love secret?
